pages.text: In order to work with Essentia in a more precise manner it is necessary to be able to measure $(bold)exactly$() how much Essentia is involved in any process. The $(item)Pure Crystal$() we just created is, in fact, the perfect instrument for that. Essentia seeping through the crystal shows small colorations, allowing accurate measurements.
Set into alchemically mostly inert precious metals such as gold, the pure crystal acts as a precise gauge for local Essentia levels.

$(bold)Usage on Constructs$()$(br)To measure the Essentia levels in a construct, such as a crucible, simply look at the construct with the $(item)Essentia Gauge$() in hand.$(br2)$(bold)Usage in the Environment$()$(br)To measure the Essentia levels in a chunk, right-click and hold with the $(item)Essentia Gauge$() in hand.
